prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
The shirt I ordered came stained and with a tear. Completely unacceptable for the price.

I tried to reach customer service three times about my late delivery, and no one responded. Very frustrating!

The food was cold and bland, and the service was slow. I expected better from this place.

Received a faulty gadget and the return process is a nightmare. I won’t buy again.

I ordered a vegan meal and got something with meat. How hard can it be to read an order?

The app keeps crashing, and I can't access my account. This is getting ridiculous.

The staff seemed disinterested and unhelpful. I felt like I was bothering them.

I was charged twice for the same subscription. I’ve reached out but no resolution yet.

The hotel room was nothing like the photos online. Very misleading advertising!

I waited an hour for my food and when it arrived, it was incorrect. Very disappointing.

The online support chat was useless. The representative didn’t help at all.

I booked a flight that was canceled last minute with no options provided. Totally unacceptable.

The quality of the product is not what I expected. I feel cheated.

I ordered a gift that never arrived on time. My friend’s birthday was ruined.

The checkout process was confusing and my order ended up being wrong. Not impressed.

The service at the restaurant was rude, and my meal was subpar. I won’t return.

I was promised a refund, but it has been weeks and I still haven’t seen it.

The app is user-unfriendly and constantly freezes. I’m about to delete it.

The tour was poorly organized, and our guide was late. It ruined the experience for us.

I received a damaged item and the customer service was not helpful at all. Very frustrating.

I was treated poorly by the staff, and I won’t be returning to this place.

The product broke after a week of use. I expected better quality.

I was charged extra fees that were not disclosed at checkout. Very misleading.

The food was overpriced for the quality we received. I won’t be coming back.

I had to wait on hold for over an hour to speak with someone. Terrible service!

The delivery was late and the driver was rude. Not a good experience.

I thought I was signing up for a free trial, but I was charged immediately. Not cool.

The service at this café was slow, and my order was wrong. Really disappointing.

The app promised great features, but they never work. Really frustrating.

The hotel was dirty and the staff was unhelpful. I expected more for my money.

The product description was misleading, and the item did not match what was advertised.

I received a call from customer service that was completely unhelpful. What a waste of time.

The entire experience felt rushed and disorganized. I won’t recommend this place.

My order was canceled without any explanation. Very unprofessional.

The food was bland and overpriced. I expected better quality.

The subscription service has been unreliable. I often don’t receive my items on time.

I found hair in my food, and the manager didn’t seem to care. Disgusting.

The website is hard to navigate, and I kept getting errors when I tried to place my order.

I had a bad experience with the flight attendants. They were not friendly at all.

The product I received looked nothing like the pictures on the website. Very misleading.

The customer service rep was dismissive of my concerns. I felt unheard.

I didn’t get the assistance I needed, and now my issue is unresolved. Very frustrating.

The hotel room was noisy and uncomfortable. I couldn’t sleep at all.

I was promised a delivery date, but it was missed without any communication. Very disappointing. 

The food took forever to arrive, and when it did, it was cold. Not acceptable.
